Alias.name: setup
Alias.script: snd.send("config wrapwidth 0") snd.send("config separator ##") snd.send("config auto_outc on") snd.send("config tellsprefix on") snd.send("config curemsgs default") snd.send("config fishnumbers on") send("config affliction_view on", false) send("config simple_diag on", false) send("config pagelength 250", false) send("config grabcorpses on", false) send("config viewtitles off", false) send("config combatmessages on", false) send("config autodoors on", false) send("Config Ansi ON", false) send("Config mxp on", false) send("config simpletargeting on", false) send("config dialogue highlight", false) send("Config prettynumbers off", false)

Alias.name: toggles
Alias.script: cecho("<white>Toggles:") for tog in pairs(snd.toggles) do if snd.toggles[tog] then cecho("<green>\n"..string.title(tog)) else cecho("<red>\n"..string.title(tog)) end end send(" ")

Alias.name: on
Alias.script: snd.toggles.active = true snd.channeling = false cecho("<green>Darkside is ON!") snd.send("def") send(" ")

Alias.name: off
Alias.script: snd.toggles.active = false snd.channeling = true cecho("<red>Darkside is OFF!") send(" ")

Alias.name: listening
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "off" then if snd.toggles.listening then snd.toggle("listening") snd.callers = {} end else if not snd.toggles.listening then snd.toggle("listening") end snd.toggles.listening = true if snd.offense_loaded then snd.callers = {} for name in string.gmatch(matches[2], '([^ ]+)') do table.insert(snd.callers, string.title(name)) end cecho("<white>Listening to: <green>"..table.concat(snd.callers, "<white>, <green>").."<white>!") send(" ") else cecho("<white>Listening <green>ON<white>!") send(" ") end end

Alias.name: Purge/Purify/Panacea

Alias.name: Disperse
Alias.script:
if matches[2] ~= "none" and matches[2]~= "callers" and matches[2]~="all" then send(" ") cecho("
<red>Not a viable choice! <white>Enter either: <red>none <white>| <yellow>callers <white>| <green>all") snd.toggles.dispersing = false else snd.disperse = matches[2] if snd.disperse == "none" then snd.toggles.dispersing = false send(" ") cecho("
<red>Dispersing is now off.") else snd.toggles.dispersing = true send(" ") cecho("
<red>Dispersing: <green>"..snd.disperse) end end

Alias.name: rock city
Alias.script:
if snd.toggles.rockharvest then snd.rock_on = true if snd.city == "Spinesreach" then snd.send("path track 11687") snd.which_path = "verminspines" elseif snd.city == "Bloodloch" then snd.send("path track 9193") snd.which_path = "verminbloodloch" elseif snd.city == "Duiran" then snd.send("path track 44060") snd.which_path = "verminduiran" elseif snd.city == "Enorian" then snd.send("path track 56484") snd.which_path = "verminenorian" end enableTimer("moveroom")
if snd.which_path ~= "" then bot.going = true bot.path = sndpathpick() end else snd.rock_on = false bot.going = false end

Alias.script: snd.mount = "276905" -- your horse's ID number snd.send("qeb qdmount"..snd.sep.."order "..snd.mount.." follow me")

Alias.name: shield tattoo
Alias.script: snd.toggles.attacking = false snd.toggles.bashing = false snd.toggles.fasthunt = false if snd.toggles.attacking then snd.send("undefend") end if snd.have_aff("paresis") then snd.send("firstaid elevate paresis") end if snd.class == "Carnifex" then snd.send("qeb soul shield") elseif snd.class == "Warden" then snd.send("qeb soul shield") else snd.send("qeb touch shield tattoo") end

Alias.name: wield none
Alias.script: if (snd.wielded.left.name or snd.wielded.right.name) == ("a Master Gulleye's Rod" or "a venantium fishing rod") then snd.send("unwield pole") else snd.send("wipe left"..snd.sep.."wipe right"..snd.sep.."secure left"..snd.sep.."secure right"..snd.sep.."wear tower"..snd.sep.."wear buckler"..snd.sep.."wear shield") end

Alias.name: landmarks
Alias.script: if snd.landmarks[matches[2]] then --snd.send("path track "..snd.landmarks[matches[2]]) snd.moving_to = snd.landmarks[matches[2]] else --snd.send("path track "..matches[2]) snd.moving_to = matches[2] end snd.core()

Alias.name: Auto Harvest Rocks
Alias.script:
if snd.toggles.rockharvest then snd.which_path = ""
if matches[3] then if matches[3] == "bloodwood" or matches[3] == "vortex" or matches[3] == "lair" or matches[3] == "endgame" or matches[3] == "high" or matches[3] == "medium" or matches[3] == "low" then snd.which_path = matches[3] else cecho("\n<red>Not a viable choice! Enter a viable choice or only enter 'gogo'!") cecho("\n<green>bloodwood (99+ and separate), vortex (99+ and separate), luziths lair (99+ and separate), endgame (93+), high (61-93), medium (31-60), and low (1-30)") end else local level = "" for check in string.gmatch(gmcp.Char.Status.level, '[%d]+') do if level == "" then level = tonumber(check) end end if level > 93 then snd.which_path = "endgame" elseif (level < 93 and level > 60) then snd.which_path = "high" elseif (level < 60 and level > 31) then snd.which.path = "medium" else snd.which_path = "low" end end
if snd.rock_on then snd.rock_on = false bot.going = false echo("ROCK HARVEST OFF") else snd.rock_on = true echo("ROCK HARVEST ON") end
if snd.which_path ~= "" then bot.going = true bot.path = sndpathpick() end
end

Alias.name: group
Alias.script: snd.group = {} if matches[2] ~= "none" then for name in string.gmatch(matches[2], '([^ ]+)') do table.insert(snd.group, string.title(name)) end end display(snd.group)

Alias.name: Whois Person
Alias.script:
local name = matches[2]:title() local x, c if not sndNDB_Exists(name) then snd.message(name.." isn't tracked by database.") else x = sndNDB.players[name] c = sndNDB_getColour(name)
cecho("
<blue>- <NavajoWhite>"..x.title.." <blue>"..string.rep("-", 70-(string.len(x.title)+3)).."
") cecho("
<DimGrey> City : <"..c..">"..x.city..string.rep(" ", 31-string.len(x.city)).." <DimGrey> Level: <white>"..x.level) cecho("
<DimGrey> Guild: <white>"..x.guild..string.rep(" ", 31-string.len(x.guild)).." <DimGrey> Rank : <white>"..x.xp_rank) cecho("
<DimGrey> Class: <white>"..x.class..string.rep(" ", 31-string.len(x.class)).." <DimGrey> Race : <white>"..x.race.."
") cecho("
<blue>"..string.rep("-", 70)) cecho("
 ") send(" ",false) end

Alias.name: walkarea
Alias.script: -- Used to quickly walk through an area without touching the mobs, use triggers to define ways to stop as in the Orrery Globe method snd.toggles.fastwalk = true snd_walkArea() expandAlias("move")

Alias.name: target
Alias.script:
snd.target = string.title(matches[2]) if snd.toggles.calling then snd.send("wt Target: "..snd.target) end echo("Target: "..snd.target) send(" ") if snd.target_trigger_id then killTrigger(snd.target_trigger_id) end snd.target_trigger_id = tempTrigger(snd.target, [[selectString("]] .. snd.target .. [[", 1) fg("DarkOrchid") resetFormat()]]) if snd.target_trigger_idlow then killTrigger(snd.target_trigger_idlow) end snd.target_trigger_idlow = tempTrigger(string.lower(snd.target), [[selectString("]] .. string.lower(snd.target) .. [[", 1) fg("DarkOrchid") resetFormat()]]) if snd.offense_loaded then snd.reset_target() snd.target_gone = false end if snd.gui.enabled then enemy:echo("
Target:"..snd.target.."
") if #snd.target_has > 1 then eaffs:echo(table.concat(snd.target_has, "
")) else eaffs:echo("
enemy affs
") end end

Alias.name: stop attacking
Alias.script: if mmp ~= nil then expandAlias("mstop", false) end if snd.toggles.attacking == true then snd.toggle("attacking") end snd.send("queue clear") snd.send("path stop") if snd.bashing_loaded then if snd.toggles.fasthunt then expandAlias("ff", false) end bot.going = false snd.toggles.bashing = false snd.defenses.def_vigor.needit = false snd.which_path = "" end if snd.offense_loaded then snd.send("target nothing" .. snd.sep .. "target nothing with right") snd.hound_queue = {} end if snd.ylem_loaded then ylm.active = false end snd.pathing = false snd.toggles.fastwalk = false snd.updateToggles()

Alias.name: target call over web - individual targets
Alias.script:
send("wt Target: "..matches[2]) snd.target = string.title(matches[2]) echo("Target: "..snd.target) send(" ") if snd.gui.enabled then enemy:echo("
Target:"..snd.target.."
") if #snd.target_has > 1 then eaffs:echo(table.concat(snd.target_has, "
")) else eaffs:echo("enemy affs") end end if snd.target_trigger_id then killTrigger(snd.target_trigger_id) end snd.target_trigger_id = tempTrigger(snd.target, [[selectString("]] .. snd.target .. [[", 1) fg("DarkOrchid") resetFormat()]]) if snd.target_trigger_idlow then killTrigger(snd.target_trigger_idlow) end snd.target_trigger_idlow = tempTrigger(string.lower(snd.target), [[selectString("]] .. string.lower(snd.target) .. [[", 1) fg("DarkOrchid") resetFormat()]]) if snd.offense_loaded then snd.reset_target() end

Alias.name: Main index
Alias.script:
cecho("
<CadetBlue>Sunder Helpfile") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>---------------") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Welcome to <green>Sunder<ForestGreen>! This helpfile is meant to give you an introduction to different things that <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>can do. It will not cover every option entirely, but it will provide the most often used or asked about items a bit more light to show how or when to use them.") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>The first thing you should know is the <DeepSkyBlue>stap <ForestGreen>command. You type <DeepSkyBlue>stap <ForestGreen>and <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>will cease whatever it is currently attempting to do, for the most part. Some items may need to be toggled manually depending on the situation, but by and large <DeepSkyBlue>stap <ForestGreen>will keep you from hitting someone or something, or any other number of items.") cecho("
") cecho("
<MediumTurquoise>The index for the rest of the helpfiles is as such:") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Bashing <ForestGreen>Do you want to go bashing? <green>Sunder<ForestGreen> has you covered!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>PK <ForestGreen>Playerkilling and you. Please practice safe PvP.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Defenses <ForestGreen>How to upkeep, turn on/off and customize defenses.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Ylem <ForestGreen>Finding minors and other ylem based information.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Utilities <ForestGreen>Vermin, fishing, shops, questing and more.") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Each above entry will point you toward more specific items in each section as needed.") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Use <DeepSkyBlue>sunder help <subject> <ForestGreen>to navigate through everything else.") cecho("
") snd.set_vitals()

Alias.name: Ylem helpfile
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>YLEM <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>----------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Hunting after those elusive minors and lessers has never been easier! This will walk you through how to do that with a few easy steps. To start, you will need to make sure you have learned <DeepSkyBlue>LEYLINES <ForestGreen>in <MediumTurquoise>Vision <ForestGreen>(289 lessons) and <DeepSkyBlue>SHACKLING <ForestGreen>in <MediumTurquoise>Refining <ForestGreen>(239 lessons). While <DeepSkyBlue>shackling <ForestGreen>is not necessarily needed for this to work, it will benefit you in the long run and keep you from having to deal with multiple eld at once. In the process of learning <DeepSkyBlue>leylines<ForestGreen>, you will also learn <DeepSkyBlue>DETECTION<ForestGreen>, which will assist you in finding focal points. This is only needed if you do not have any reserves to use <MediumTurquoise>MANIPULATE PYLON FOR NODESENSE<ForestGreen>, which allows you to PATH TRACK MINOR directly to the focal point. For this, you will also need to purchase ylem goggles from the vendor at your pylon. Just PATH TRACK PYLON and ASK <vendor> WARES to BUY GOGGLES FROM <vendor>.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>The <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>ylem finder is simple to use! To start, just type in <DeepSkyBlue>goylem start <ForestGreen>and watch as it does all the work of walking around for you. It has a set path that it follows and is easy to change if you wish to do so or if new areas are added before <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>is updated again. It will continually run until it finds either a minor or a lesser. If it finds a minor, you can either DETECTION ON and walk around to find the focal point (it is highlighted in <green>Sunder<ForestGreen> already, so you won't miss it!) or you can PATH TRACK MINOR if you have ylem goggles and have used MANIPULATE PYLON FOR NODESENSE. The nodesense defense will only last for one hour or ten uses. Once you find the minor and extract it (EXTRACTION is the syntax) fully, you can <DeepSkyBlue>goylem next <ForestGreen>to have <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>continue the set path. If you need to stop at any point, you can <DeepSkyBlue>goylem stop <ForestGreen>and it will take you back to your city and reset the variables to start over if you decide to pick it up again. If you need to stop temporarily, you can just <DeepSkyBlue>stap<ForestGreen> and then <DeepSkyBlue>goylem <ForestGreen>to start back up again where you left off!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>goylem start <ForestGreen>Start finding foci") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>goylem next <ForestGreen>Move to the next area") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>goylem stop <ForestGreen>Stop and return to your city") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>goylem <ForestGreen>Continue if you had to stop") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>sh <ForestGreen>Shackle an eld in the room to stop it from hitting you!") cecho("
")

Alias.name: Toggles help
Alias.script:
cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>| <CadetBlue>SUNDER TOGGLES <MediumSeaGreen>|") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>| <ansiCyan>TOGGLE NAME <MediumSeaGreen> | <ansiCyan>INFOMATION <MediumSeaGreen>| <ansiCyan>TOGGLES <MediumSeaGreen>|") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
")
local togglecolor = ""
for k, v in pairs(snd.toggle_info) do
if snd.toggles[k] then togglecolor = "DeepSkyBlue" else togglecolor = "SlateGray" end
cecho("<MediumSeaGreen>|<"..togglecolor.."> "..padRight(k, 13).. "<MediumSeaGreen>|<ForestGreen> "..padRight(tostring(v.info), 44).."<MediumSeaGreen>|<MediumTurquoise> "..padRight(tostring(v.command), 34).."<MediumSeaGreen>|
") end
cecho("<MediumSeaGreen>*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*
")

Alias.name: Sunder bashing
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue>Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>bashing<CadetBlue> help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------") cecho("
<green>Sunder <ForestGreen>has several methods of helping you bash, from hitting things in your room to helping you navigate the landscape of Aetolia and its many areas. You can easily know if <green>Sunder<ForestGreen> recognizes your area by doing a check with the <red>SURVEY<ForestGreen> command. As long as you see mob names, <green>Sunder<ForestGreen> will be able to hit things for you.") cecho("
") cecho("
<red>Consider this your warning: <ForestGreen>The folks who upkeep Sunder do not, by any means, condone or suggest using Sunder to do things while you are AFK or otherwise unable to attend to your character. From HELP AUTOMATION -> FULLY automating quests and hunting - with movement and all actions included in the triggers - are allowed so long as one is present at the computer, as well as gambling automation. Please do not abuse what is being given to you without regard for the admin stance.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>aa <ForestGreen>Make <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>try to hit everything in the room!") cecho("
 <ForestGreen> If there is nothing left in the room, this will turn off.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>ff <ForestGreen>Want to walk around manually and have Sunder hit things? Use this.") cecho("
 <ForestGreen> It automatically turns on hitting when it finds a valid target.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>grp <person> <ForestGreen>Inform <green>Sunder<ForestGreen> of your bashing party.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>grp queen rook pawn <ForestGreen>Example of adding more than one person.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>orbs <ForestGreen>Activate your ylem orbs with one alias!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>sunder toggle generic <ForestGreen>Use generic mob type instead of number to bash.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>sch <ForestGreen>Alias you can use to hit your current 't' target with your bashing attacks, and will shield/etc like normal bashing when low in health.") cecho("
") cecho("
") cecho("
<green>Sunder<ForestGreen> has some more advanced features listed in <DeepSkyBlue>sunder help autobashing<ForestGreen>.")
cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Sunder auto bashing
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue>Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>autobashing<CadetBlue> help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------") cecho("
<green>Sunder <ForestGreen>recognizes a good majority of the areas in the game, including the main bashing areas and most of the ones you might use while gaining levels. The following methods will help you bash these areas, either singular or multiple at a time.") cecho("
") cecho("
<red>Consider this your warning: <ForestGreen>The folks who upkeep Sunder do not, by any means, condone or suggest using Sunder to do things while you are AFK or otherwise unable to attend to your character. From <red>HELP AUTOMATION -><ForestGreen> 'FULLY automating quests and hunting - with movement and all actions included in the triggers - are allowed so long as one is present at the computer, as well as gambling automation.' <red>Please do not abuse what is being given to you without regard for the admin stance.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>goarea <ForestGreen>Bash the current area you're in and then walk back to your city.") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>Use this for bashing just one area. No need to use the below command.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>bashpath <areas> <ForestGreen>Define your custom bashing route from valid areas.") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>It will automatically walk you from the last room of area 1 to area 2, etc.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>bashpath tiyen, xaanhal, mamashi <ForestGreen>- for example, would bash those areas and then head home.") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>There are some more functions in the scripts for use in your code for creating paths, doing new areas, etc.") --You would want to look into SND Autopaths->Creating->start/add/compile.
cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Questing Help File
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>QUESTING <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Always ending up with odds and ends in your inventory or kestrels following you around EVERYWHERE because you dared to walk through Three Widows? Well no more! You will now be able to toggle quests on and off so that you only whistle or pick up items when you want!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>As of right now, there is only one toggle to turn it on/off. More may be added in the future! It will not auto-walk areas for you, you will still need to walk around and while you do so <green>Sunder<ForestGreen> will pick up items and turn them in as appropriate. ") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>toggle questing <ForestGreen>Toggles questing on/off") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Who Help File
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>WHO <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>---------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Tired of looking through the who list trying to figure out who is where and who they are with when looking for that pesky lesser that was just tapped? Well, thanks to <green>Czcibor<ForestGreen>, <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>has built in group checking via the who list!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Using the alias <DeepSkyBlue>WHO GROUPS <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>will now sift through the who list and capture room locations. Once it is done with that, it will show you the names of the rooms that have more than one person in that location, how many people are there, and then who all is in that location! Note that those with the <red>cloaking<ForestGreen> artifact or in hidden rooms are unable to be tracked in this manner.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>who groups <ForestGreen>Shows the full WHO list and then the grouped rooms with more than one person") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>---------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Vermin Help File
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>VERMIN <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-----------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>We get it! Every time you see that daily/weekly/monthly(especially the monthly) milestone for vermin, you just want to run head first into a team of mages collapsing singularities and calamaties! So hopefully these will make your life easier from here on out and save you from death by mages! No guarantees :(") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>First, you will want to make sure you are wielding whatever you need to kill the vermin. After you are ready to start your quest of ridding a city of its vermin, you just <DeepSkyBlue>PATH TRACK <ForestGreen>to any city <LimeGreen>(make sure you are not an enemy!) <ForestGreen>and then type <DeepSkyBlue>toggle vermin <ForestGreen>to start! This will work similar to <DeepSkyBlue>gogo <ForestGreen>in that it will just begin bashing from where you are currently. No matter which city you begin your vermin bashing in, it will end at the vermin mob and will automatically sell your vermin! So no more accidental offerings of vermin to your gods! Should you need to finish early, just type <DeepSkyBlue>toggle vermin <ForestGreen>again and an echo will pop up to remind you to go sell your vermin!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>toggle vermin <ForestGreen>Toggles the vermin autobasher on/off") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-----------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Fluidcache Help File
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>FLUIDCACHE <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>---------------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Ever log in and notice you lost a bunch of refills because your vials, bandages, or (gods forbid) rags decayed? Well NO MORE! Or at least, LESS LIKELY! <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>is now equipped with a few more aliases to help alleviate this problem!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Simply input the alias you want to use and then either let <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>fill your empty vials, bandages, or rags or consume them into your fluidcache. If you are new to Aetolia, make sure you read <green>HELP FLUIDCACHE <ForestGreen>if you have not already!") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Keep in mind that these aliases will not buy anything for you. Please refer to <DeepSkyBlue>sunder help shops <ForestGreen>to see the aliases that will purchase bulk items for you!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>venoms <ForestGreen>First buy the rags you need for combat and type <DeepSkyBlue>venoms") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>to have <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>fill your rags for you. You can search this") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>alias in your scripts to change which venoms you want it to fill!") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>unvenom <ForestGreen>Just what it says! Typing <DeepSkyBlue>unvenom <ForestGreen>will fluidcache consume") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>all the venoms from your rags!") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>fillvials <ForestGreen>This alias will fill the vials in your inventory from your fluidcache.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>unfillvials <ForestGreen>Like <DeepSkyBlue>unvenom<ForestGreen>, this alias will consume the elixirs") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>in your vials back into your fluidcache.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>fillbandages <ForestGreen>This will fill the clean bandages in your inventory with the poultices") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>from your fluidcache.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>unfillbandages <ForestGreen>Again... same as the other 'un' aliases, but for poultices.") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>---------------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Shop Help File
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>SHOPS <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>----------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Purchasing necessary items from shops can be a bit mundane, but NO MORE! Often you will find yourself buying many refills or masses of pills - to help combat this, <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>includes a few aliases to help make that less painful!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>The first thing you need to do is find a shop. You can do this by going to any city (including Esterport!) and using <DeepSkyBlue>PATH TRACK DIRECTORY<ForestGreen>. This will take you to the directory where you can peruse all the shops in that city (think of it like a search engine). From there you can <DeepSkyBlue>DIRECTORY <ForestGreen>'<DeepSkyBlue>item<ForestGreen>' to see which shop is carrying the item(s) you need. If you have MXP turned on, you can click on the vnum for the shop you want or <DeepSkyBlue>PATH TRACK vnum <ForestGreen>to get there.") cecho("
") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Once you are in a shop, you will simply need to put in the alias for the items you wish to purchase and let <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>do the rest!") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>buypills # <ForestGreen>Pills! Typing <DeepSkyBlue>buypills <ForestGreen>followed by an amount will buy that amount") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>of every type of pill! EXAMPLE: <DeepSkyBlue>buypills 500 <ForestGreen>will buy <LimeGreen>500 <ForestGreen>of each pill.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>fillcache # type <ForestGreen>Fluidcache! Just use <DeepSkyBlue>fillcache <ForestGreen>followed by the number of times") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>you want to buy a refill and what type of refill you want to buy.") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>The types are: <DeepSkyBlue>venoms<ForestGreen>, <DeepSkyBlue>poultices<ForestGreen>, and <DeepSkyBlue>elixirs<ForestGreen>. EXAMPLE: <DeepSkyBlue>fillcache") cecho("
 <DeepSkyBlue>10 elixirs <ForestGreen>will purchase <LimeGreen>10 <ForestGreen>refills of each type of elixir. The purchase") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>line may be gagged, so just check your FC before and after purchasing!") cecho("
 <LimeGreen>**NOTE** <ForestGreen>This will buy the amount of refills, so to fill your cache(<LimeGreen>1500<ForestGreen>)") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>you will only need to purchase <LimeGreen>30 <ForestGreen>refills!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>----------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Fishing Help File
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>FISHING <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Our <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>fishing system has been put together from several different systems, and will help you with your fishing milestones or just when you want to kick back and relax to earn some gold.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>1. Put up your wielded items manually and wield your pole.
") cecho("<ForestGreen>2. Go to a fishing hole.
") cecho("<ForestGreen>3. Do '<DeepSkyBlue>FISHING DISCERN<ForestGreen>' to make sure you see fish. This will
") cecho("<ForestGreen> track the hole type, vnum, and what fish you see automatically
") cecho("<ForestGreen> in a database it creates on the first time you use it.
") cecho("<ForestGreen>4. If you can fish there and there are fish, type in '<DeepSkyBlue>afish<ForestGreen>'
") cecho("<ForestGreen> to turn on the auto-fisher.
") cecho("<ForestGreen>5. If you run out of fish in this hole, it will turn off fishing on
") cecho("<ForestGreen> its own. You can also type in '<DeepSkyBlue>afish<ForestGreen>' to turn it off.
") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>afish <ForestGreen> Turns the auto-fisher off/on") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>fishing search ?? <ForestGreen> You can search for a water hole type, or fish, from holes you've discerned.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>fishing search full ?? <ForestGreen>If you prepend <DeepSkyBlue>info<ForestGreen> or <DeepSkyBlue>full<ForestGreen> it displays complete info instead of abridged.") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Name database help file
Alias.script: cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>Name Database <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("\n<MediumSeaGreen>-------------------------------------------") cecho("\n<ForestGreen>Deprecated. No longer used.")

Alias.name: Sunder Utilities Index
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue>Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>UTILITIES <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------") cecho("
<green>Sunder <ForestGreen>has several different utilities that are quite useful! Below is a summarized list that will direct you to the correct files so that you can become familiar with them and reference back to them at any time!") cecho("
") cecho("
<MediumTurquoise>To view the following <green>Sunder <MediumTurquoise>help files, use <DeepSkyBlue>sunder help <MediumTurquoise><filename>!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Vermin <ForestGreen>Explantion on <green>Sunder's <ForestGreen>vermin autobasher!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Fishing <ForestGreen>Explantion on how to use <green>Sunder's <ForestGreen>fishing utilities!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Shops <ForestGreen>Quick aliases to make purchasing easier!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Fluidcache <ForestGreen>Aliases to consume and fill vials/rags/bandages!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Who <green>Sunder's <ForestGreen>WHO parsing system and how it works!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Questing <ForestGreen>Helpful questing aliases (no more pesky kestrels following you around!)") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>Namedb <ForestGreen>All the commands for the databse.") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------")

Alias.name: Sunder PK helpfile
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue>Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>PvP<CadetBlue> help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------") cecho("
<green>Sunder <ForestGreen>has several built in ways for every class to be, at some level, useful. Even if it is just automatically attacking a target with a bashing attack. <green>Sunder <ForestGreen>is not and will not be updated with the best 1v1 PvP methods, nor will requests for 1v1 specific items be given time. The intent of Sunder has been and always will be the ability for the average player to get into the PvP scene at the lowest level and be able to participate in team scenarios.") cecho("
") cecho("
<red>Some of the classes have decently fine-tuned aliases (Syssin, Templar) due to the original creator spending time in those classes. Remember that these were built on the effort of another player and they do not speak to your own skill or development. Using them to beat people at the low or middle tier of skill level does not indicate that you are improving. If you are interested in learning to PvP in the 1v1 arena, your best bet is to examine what is built here and expand or change it as opposed to relying on it without modification. These are public offenses and people can and will abuse their access to them to make it easy to beat you.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>ls <person> <ForestGreen>Choose your target caller(s)") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>ls stine mjoll didi <ForestGreen>Example of listening to more than one person.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>loc <ForestGreen>Need help?! Call out your place in the world over web!") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>acl <ForestGreen>Toggle calling of afflictions over web.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>tcl <ForestGreen>Toggle calling of targets over web.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>toggles disperse <none/callers/all> <ForestGreen>Automatic dispersing of writhe affs.") cecho("
 <ForestGreen>Default none. Not always necessary.") cecho("
") cecho("
<green>Sunder<ForestGreen> target calling - instead of the old rigid lists found within Sunder, we will now utilize the custom, on the fly lists along with our name database to be able to cycle through targets effectively in the room. Please see <DeepSkyBlue>sunder help calling<ForestGreen> for more information on using that.") cecho("
") cecho("
<green>Sunder<ForestGreen> has the following aliases available for you to use in combat. There may be more aliases included in the settings, but not always!")
if snd.class == "Monk" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Will use mind batter to hit with affs, if enemy prone then wrench.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>head <white> - Used for damage, does not deviate unless target is proned.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Limbs:") cecho("
 <green>ms<white> - Used to hit different limbs, will change combo depending on parry.") elseif snd.class == "Shapeshifter" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>dmg<white> - Goes for the head. Each time. Big damage/bleeding if not parried.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Limb:") cecho("
 <green>ms <white> - Straight limb breaks into jawlocks.") cecho("
 <green>insta<white> - Goes for quarter kills. Check AB QUARTER for more information.") cecho("
 <green>limbs<white> - Utilizes slash to delay limb breaks, good for pushing level 2 breaks.") elseif snd.class == "Syssin" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>ms <white> - Basic dstab w/venoms. No hypnosis.") cecho("
 <green>magic<white> - More advanced, geared towards magic, uses hypnosis.") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - More advanced, geared towards physical, uses hypnosis.") cecho("
 <green>kl<white> - 1v1 offense. Does not snap for you as that requires timing.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>dmg<white> - Straight damage.") elseif snd.class == "Wayfarer" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>legs <white> - Uses lob to pressure leg breaks, will try to dropstrike if able.") cecho("
 <green>lock<white> - Experimental skirmish route to seal locks w/slaughter and muddled.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>dmg<white> - Sensitivity/sight to support transfix. Boosted halt to keep people in room.") cecho("
 <green>gaff<white> - Group affs w/preference toward venom lock. Slaughter if prone w/sensitivity.") cecho("
 <green>bleed<white> - Bleed focused to assist Templar w/hemorrhage.") elseif (snd.class == "Templar" or snd.class == "Revenant") then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>ret <white> - The 1v1 standard. Lock into retribution.") cecho("
 <green>newb<white> - Basic venoms, no bladefire empowerments, no vorpal.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>dmg<white> - Use a 2h weapon to zeal/dsw someone and do physical damage.") cecho("
 <green>bleed<white> - Bleed focused affs into hemorrhage.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Limb:") cecho("
 <green>limbs<white> - Two small bludgeon weapons to deal bruising and limb damage.") elseif snd.class == "Shaman" or snd.class == "Alchemist" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>ms <white> - Straight vinelash w/venoms.") cecho("
 <green>storm<white> - Works toward stormtouched, then goes for lightning damage.") cecho("
 <green>supp<white> - Aff-lock support.") elseif snd.class == "Sentinel" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>salve<white> - Works towards frozen w/limb breaks. Need raloth/icewyrm.") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Venom lock into spinecut death sequence.") cecho("
 <green>group<white> - Group focused small aff pool into spinecut.") cecho("
 <green>ms<white> - Just venoms, no dhuriv attacks, perfect for starters.") elseif snd.class == "Luminary" or snd.class == "Earthcaller" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>git<white> - Damage kill with aff stacking and overwhelm.") cecho("
 <green>mana<white> - Straight mana sap.") cecho("
 <green>dmg<white> - Smite + chasten.") cecho("
 <green>ms<white> - Sight into tfix/overwhelm.") elseif snd.class == "Ascendril" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>damage<white> - Damage kill.") cecho("
 <green>fire<white> - Set them ablaze and watch them burn.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>affs<white> - Build affs!") cecho("
 <green>solo<white> - Push limb damage/frozen for a shatter!") elseif snd.class == "Zealot" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Damage:") cecho("
 <green>dmg<white> - Damage kill.") cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>fire<white> - Focus on ablaze for Zealot support I guess? idk") elseif snd.class == "Archivist" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>dmg <white> - Damage kill") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Build mental affs and go for unravel") elseif snd.class == "Carnifex" or snd.class == "Warden" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>dmg <white> - Damage kill") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Build affs!") cecho("
 <green>limbs<white> - Overall limb route") cecho("
 <green>legs<white> - Specifically for legs!") elseif snd.class == "Indorani" or snd.class == "Oneiromancer" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>dmg <white> - Damage kill") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Build affs! High Aeon/Hourglass prio.") elseif snd.class == "Praenomen"or snd.class == "Akkari" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>dmg <white> - Damage kill") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Build affs!") cecho("
 <green>mez<white> - Work on siphoning mana for annihilate and mesmerize!") elseif snd.class == "Teradrim" or snd.class == "Tidesage" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>dmg <white> - Damage kill") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Build affs!") elseif snd.class == "Sciomancer" then cecho("
<goldenrod>Afflictions:") cecho("
 <green>dmg <white> - Damage kill") cecho("
 <green>aff<white> - Build affs!") cecho("
 <green>limbs<white> - Overall limb route via grip and erupt") end
cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>------------------------------------------") cecho("
") cecho("
")

Alias.name: Sunder defenses helpfile
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>Defenses <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>----------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>Upkeep of defenses can be a tedious task, especially those stripped after a certain amount of time or if you just don't want to worry about it. To that end, Sunder is equipped to be able to help you upkeep defenses in a mildly intelligent manner via checking what skills you have access. The system uses GMCP to automatically check your skills, as well as checking your tattoos and raceskills, to accurately and easily keep track.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>HOW IT WORKS!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------------") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>defup <ForestGreen>Turn on automatic defense upkeep of defenses.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>kd <defname> <ForestGreen>Toggle a specific defense upkeep on/off.") cecho("
") cecho("
<green>Sunder<ForestGreen> also has the built in capability to utilize the antiquated artifact goggles, making a number of defs instantaneous and without cost.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>toggle goggles <ForestGreen>Toggle Sunder using goggles or not.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>mygoggles # <ForestGreen>Tell Sunder what level your goggles are set to.") cecho("
") cecho("
")

Alias.name: Sunder calling helpfile
Alias.script:
cecho("<CadetBlue> Welcome to the <green>Sunder <DeepSkyBlue>Calling <CadetBlue>help file!") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>----------------------------------------") cecho("
<ForestGreen>In previous iterations of Sunder, we used static calling lists that were susceptible to failure due to not having new people updated, people switching tethers, needing different orders, etc. To that end, we have updated our methodology and you may find all of the ways to manipulate targets below.") cecho("
") cecho("
<CadetBlue>ALIASES") cecho("
<MediumSeaGreen>-------") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>tcl <ForestGreen>Turn on automatic target calling.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>atl [name]<ForestGreen> Add targets in the priority you specify.") cecho("
 <white> Example > <red>atl ezreal nazeebo meepo") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>atp [name] [position]<ForestGreen> Add target with/without a # value for priority.") cecho("
 <white> Example > <red>atp tryndamere 1") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>tlist<ForestGreen> List your targets in web for others.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>atlc<ForestGreen> Clears your targets out to start over.") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>atr<ForestGreen> Remove a singular target from your list.") cecho("
") cecho("
<DeepSkyBlue>nt<ForestGreen> Manually skip to the next target in line.") cecho("
")

Alias.name: ^sunder help directory$
Alias.script: cecho("\n<MediumSeaGreen>Found: <white>"..getMudletHomeDir())

Alias.name: Version
Alias.script: echo(snd.version)

Alias.name: start bashing
Alias.script: snd.toggles.bashing = true cecho("<green>Bashing ON!") send(" ") snd.room_clear = true --snd.defenses.def_vigor.needit = true snd.send("leading on")

Alias.name: stop bashing
Alias.script: snd.toggles.bashing = false snd.defenses.def_vigor.needit = false cecho("<green>Bashing OFF!") if snd.toggles.fasthunt then snd.toggles.fasthunt = false echo("\nFasthunt OFF!") end snd.send("queue clear") send(" ")

Alias.name: fasthunt
Alias.script: snd.toggle("fasthunt")

Alias.name: generics
Alias.script: snd.toggle("generics") if snd.toggles.generics then cecho("\n<red>The use of a generic word (ie 'kelki' instead of 'kelki1234' or just '1234') brings with it a certain amount of risk. You risk hitting an NPC that you may not mean to, including quest mobs with the same short name, or boss mobs in the same vein. This is your warning. Please use it when appropriate.") else end

Alias.name: orbs
Alias.script: snd.send("activate amberorb"..snd.sep.."activate greenorb"..snd.sep.."activate whiteorb"..snd.sep.."activate crimsonorb"..snd.sep.."activate ceruleanorb")

Alias.name: chocolates
Alias.script: snd.send("eat mint;eat hazelnut;eat strawberry;eat cherry;eat fudge;eat white;drink chalice;touch book")

Alias.name: move
Alias.script: x = bot.info.room x = "v"..x if bot.going then if bot.path[x] ~= nil then if string.find(bot.path[x], "pth") then y = string.sub(bot.path[x], 4) snd.moving_to = y send(" ") elseif mmp ~= nil then expandAlias("goto "..bot.path[x], false) snd.backup_path = bot.path[x] else snd.moving_to = bot.path[x] send(" ") end else echo("where r we") end end

Alias.name: initiate
Alias.script:
snd.which_path = ""
--Set the correct path, whether that is by checking level or using input from the user. if matches[3] then if matches[3] == "arbothia" or matches[3] == "bloodwood" or matches[3] == "tcanna" or matches[3] == "vortex" or matches[3] == "lair" or matches[3] == "endgame" or matches[3] == "high" or matches[3] == "medium" or matches[3] == "low" then snd.which_path = matches[3] else cecho("\n<red>Not a viable choice! Enter a viable choice or only enter 'gogo'!") cecho("\n<green>arbothia, tcanna, bloodwood (99+ and separate), vortex (99+ and separate), luziths lair (99+ and separate), endgame (93+), high (61-93), medium (31-60), and low (1-30)") end else local level = "" for check in string.gmatch(gmcp.Char.Status.level, '[%d]+') do if level == "" then level = tonumber(check) end end if level > 93 then snd.which_path = "endgame" elseif (level < 93 and level > 60) then snd.which_path = "high" elseif (level < 60 and level > 31) then snd.which.path = "medium" else snd.which_path = "low" end end
if snd.which_path ~= "" then bot.going = true bot.path = sndpathpick() if not snd.toggles.fasthunt then expandAlias("ff") end
expandAlias("aa") end

Alias.name: Vermin Basher
Alias.script:
if snd.toggles.vermin then snd.toggles.vermin = false bot.going = false disableTimer("moveroom") cecho("<red>----------------
 <red>VERMIN OFF
<red>----------------") snd.send("vermin") else snd.toggles.vermin = true if gmcp.Room.Info.area == "Spinesreach" then snd.send("vermin"..snd.sep.."path track 11687") snd.which_path = "verminspines" elseif gmcp.Room.Info.area == "Bloodloch" then snd.send("vermin"..snd.sep.."path track 9193") snd.which_path = "verminbloodloch" elseif gmcp.Room.Info.area == "Duiran" then snd.send("vermin"..snd.sep.."path track 44060") snd.which_path = "verminduiran" elseif gmcp.Room.Info.area == "Enorian" then snd.send("vermin"..snd.sep.."path track 56484") snd.which_path = "verminenorian" end
cecho("
<green>----------------
 <green>VERMIN ON
<green>----------------") enableTimer("moveroom")
if snd.which_path ~= "" then bot.going = true bot.path = sndpathpick() end
end

Alias.name: See if Sunder has path
Alias.script: if sunder_areaPaths[gmcp.Room.Info.area] then snd.message("We've got a path here") else snd.message("No path here.") end

Alias.name: single attack
Alias.script: if snd.bashing.target ~= snd.target then snd.bashing.target = snd.target end for k,v in pairs(snd.class_list) do if snd.class_list[k].class == snd.class then v.func() snd.send("qeb stand"..snd.sep..battack) end end

Alias.name: Attack
Alias.script:
hp = 100*(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp/gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) if snd.class == "Templar" then if snd.toggles.zeal then snd.send("bladefire empower left with sacrifice"..snd.sep.."empower left with sacrifice"..snd.sep.."empower left with sacrifice"..snd.sep.."empower left with sacrifice"..snd.sep.."zeal "..snd.target) elseif snd.toggles.newbie then snd.send("strikebash "..snd.target) else if hp >= 65 then snd.send("dsk "..snd.target.." sacrifice sacrifice") else snd.send("cleanse left"..snd.sep.."cleanse right"..snd.sep.."dsk "..snd.target) end end
elseif snd.class == "Luminary" then hp = 100*(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp/gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) if hp <= 60 then snd.send("angel aura me") elseif snd.counterattack_active then if snd.punisher then snd.send("jig") else snd.send("angel aura me") end elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false elseif snd.toggles.lightning then snd.send("evoke lightning "..snd.target) else snd.send("smite "..snd.target) end
elseif snd.class == "Earthcaller" then hp = 100*(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp/gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) if hp <= 60 then snd.send("OSSO RIBCAGE me") elseif snd.counterattack_active then if snd.punisher then snd.send("jig") else snd.send("OSSO RIBCAGE me") end elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false elseif snd.toggles.lightning then snd.send("TECTONIC ASHFALL "..snd.target) else snd.send("quash "..snd.target) end
elseif snd.class == "Monk" then if snd.stance ~= "scorpion" and not snd.toggles.cobra then snd.send("scs") elseif hp < 75 and not snd.numbness_used then snd.send("transmute mana 1000"..snd.sep.. "numb") elseif snd.have_aff("blackout") then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.counterattack_active then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false elseif snd.toggles.cobra then if snd.stance ~= "cobra" then snd.send("cbs") else snd.send("combo "..snd.target.." sdk sdk") end else snd.send("combo "..snd.target.." sdk ucp ucp") end
elseif snd.class == "Shaman" then wp = 100*(gmcp.Char.Vitals.wp/gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxwp) if snd.familiar then if hp <= 60 then if snd.balance.morph then if snd.shamanpet == "wyvern" then snd.send("familiar morph spider"..snd.sep.."touch shield") elseif snd.shamanpet == "spider" then snd.send("familiar morph wyvern"..snd.sep.."touch shield") elseif snd.shamanpet ~= "wyvern" or snd.shamanpet ~= "spider" then snd.send("familiar morph wyvern"..snd.sep.."touch shield") end else snd.send("touch shield") end else if snd.balance.morph then if snd.shamanpet == "wyvern" then if wp>=45 and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.energy) >= 3 then snd.send("familiar morph spider"..snd.sep.."order spirit follow me"..snd.sep.."commune boost"..snd.sep.."commune lightning "..snd.target) else snd.send("familiar morph spider"..snd.sep.."order spirit follow me"..snd.sep.."commune lightning "..snd.target) end elseif snd.shamanpet == "spider" then if wp>=45 and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.energy) >= 3 then snd.send("familiar morph wyvern"..snd.sep.."order spirit follow me"..snd.sep.."commune boost"..snd.sep.."commune lightning "..snd.target) else snd.send("familiar morph wyvern"..snd.sep.."order spirit follow me"..snd.sep.."commune lightning "..snd.target) end elseif snd.shamanpet ~= "wyvern" or snd.shamanpet ~= "spider" then if wp>=45 and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.energy) >= 3 then snd.send("familiar morph wyvern"..snd.sep.."order spirit follow me"..snd.sep.."commune boost"..snd.sep.."commune lightning "..snd.target) else snd.send("familiar morph wyvern"..snd.sep.."order spirit follow me"..snd.sep.."commune lightning "..snd.target) end end else if wp>=45 and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.energy) >= 3 then snd.send("order spirit follow me"..snd.sep.."commune boost"..snd.sep.."commune lightning "..snd.target) else snd.send("commune lightning "..snd.target) end end end else snd.send("familiar recall##order spirit follow me") end
elseif snd.class == "Sentinel" then if hp <= 60 then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.counterattack_active then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false elseif snd.toggles.newbie then snd.send("dhuriv combo "..snd.target.." slash stab") else snd.send("dhuriv combo "..snd.target.." crosscut thrust") end
elseif snd.class == "Wayfarer" then if hp <= 60 then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.counterattack_active then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false else snd.send("axe chop "..snd.target) end
elseif snd.class == "Syssin" then if hp <= 60 then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.counterattack_active then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false elseif not snd.toggles.newbie then if snd.defenses.def_hiding.state == "deffed" then snd.send("backstab "..snd.target) else snd.send("bite "..snd.target.." camus") end else if snd.defenses.def_hiding.state == "deffed" then if snd.wielding("dirk") or snd.wielding("stilleto") then snd.send("backstab "..snd.target) else snd.send("quickwield right dirk"..snd.sep.."backstab "..snd.target) end else if snd.wielding("whip") then snd.send("garrote "..snd.target) else snd.send("quickwield left whip"..snd.sep.."garrote "..snd.target) end end end
elseif snd.class == "Shapeshifter" then if hp <= 60 then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.counterattack_active then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false else snd.send("combo "..snd.target.." slash slash") end
elseif snd.class == "Indorani" then if hp <= 60 then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.counterattack_active then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false else snd.send("flick bonedagger at "..snd.target) end
elseif snd.class == "Carnifex" then if hp <= 60 then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.counterattack_active then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false else snd.send("hammer doublebash "..snd.target) end
elseif snd.class == "Archivist" then
bioessence = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bio) if hp <= 70 and not snd.knit and bioessence > 0 then snd.send("bio knitting") elseif hp <= 60 and bioessence > 1 then if snd.defenses.def_ethereal.state ~= "deffed" then snd.send("bio ethereal") end elseif hp <= 60 then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.counterattack_active then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false else snd.send("incite crux "..snd.target) end
elseif snd.class == "Zealot" then if hp <= 70 then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.counterattack_active then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false else snd.send("flow "..snd.target.." pummel pummel") end
elseif snd.class == "Praenomen" then if hp <= 70 then if snd.balance.mend and hasSkill("Mend") then snd.send("mend") else snd.send("touch shield") end elseif hp <= 60 then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.counterattack_active then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false else snd.send("frenzy "..snd.target) end
elseif snd.class == "Akkari" then if hp <= 70 then if snd.balance.mend and hasSkill("Vivify") then snd.send("vivify") else snd.send("touch shield") end elseif hp <= 60 then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.counterattack_active then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false else snd.send("denounce "..snd.target) end
elseif snd.class == "Teradrim" then endur = 100*(gmcp.Char.Vitals.ep/gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxep) if hp <= 60 then snd.send("sand shield me") elseif snd.counterattack_active then snd.send("sand shield me") elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false elseif snd.balance.momentum and endur<=45 then snd.send("earth momentum "..snd.sep.."earth batter "..snd.target..snd.sep.."golem recover") else snd.send("earth batter "..snd.target..snd.sep.."golem recover") end
elseif snd.class == "Ascendril" then if hp <=40 then snd.send("touch shield") elseif hp <= 60 then if snd.reflection_charge > 0 then snd.send("cast reflection") else snd.send("touch shield") end else if gmcp.Char.Vitals.resonance == "none" or gmcp.Char.Vitals.resonance == "" or gmcp.Char.Vitals.resonance == "air" then snd.send("cast frostblade "..snd.target) elseif gmcp.Char.Vitals.resonance == "water" then snd.send("cast firelash "..snd.target) elseif gmcp.Char.Vitals.resonance == "fire" then snd.send("cast windlance "..snd.target) end end
elseif snd.class == "Sciomancer" then if hp <= 40 then snd.send("touch shield") elseif hp <= 60 then if snd.reflection_charge > 0 then snd.send("cast reflection") else snd.send("touch shield") end elseif snd.counterattack_active then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false elseif snd.toggles.newbie then snd.send("cast ruin "..snd.target) else if table.contains(gmcp.Char.Defences.List, "shadow_mantle") then if tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.shadowprice) < 4 then snd.send("shadowprice gloom " ..snd.target..snd.sep.."cast fever "..snd.target) else snd.send("cast fever " ..snd.target) end else if tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.shadowprice) < 2 then snd.send("shadowprice gloom " ..snd.target..snd.sep.."cast fever "..snd.target) else snd.send("cast fever " ..snd.target) end end end
elseif snd.class == "Oneiromancer" then hp = 100*(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp/gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) if (hp <= 60 or snd.have_aff("blackout")) and snd.shield_check then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.counterattack_active then if snd.punisher then snd.send("jig") else snd.send("touch shield") end elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false else snd.send("impel athame at "..snd.target) end elseif snd.class == "None" then hp = 100*(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp/gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) if (hp <= 60 or snd.have_aff("blackout")) and snd.shield_check then snd.send("touch shield") elseif snd.counterattack_active then if snd.punisher then snd.send("jig") else snd.send("touch shield") end elseif snd.pushattack then snd.send("push "..snd.target) snd.pushattack = false elseif (hp <= 75 or snd.have_aff("paresis") or snd.have_aff("asthma") or snd.have_aff("slickness") or snd.have_aff("aeon")) and not snd.self_prone() then snd.send("qeb astral ambrosia") else snd.send("qeb astral evert "..snd.target) end end

Alias.name: Move to next area
Alias.script:
if snd.toggles.fasthunt then
local area = sunder_areaPaths[gmcp.Room.Info.area] local last_room_of_this_area = ""
for k, v in pairs(area) do if v == "pthcity" then last_room_of_this_area = k end end
expandAlias("goto "..bot.path[last_room_of_this_area])
end

Alias.name: XP to XLVL
Alias.script: xpcheck.tolevel(tonumber(matches[2]))

Alias.name: Bashed to X Y times
Alias.script: xpcheck.bashedto(tonumber(matches[2]))

Alias.name: XP Needed From X to Y
Alias.script: if tonumber(matches[2]) > tonumber(matches[3]) then cecho("\n<red> Somebody needs to learn how to count better.") send(" ") else xpcheck.fromto(tonumber(matches[2]), tonumber(matches[3])) end

Alias.name: Reset chasing
Alias.script: demonnic.chaser:reset()

Alias.name: Debug
Alias.script: if matches[2] then demonnic:listCategories() else demonnic:toggleDebug() end

Alias.name: debug categories
Alias.script: if matches[2] then demonnic:watchCategory( matches[2] ) else demonnic:listCategories() end

Alias.name: Toggle blinking (temporary change)
Alias.script: if demonnic.chat.config.blink then demonnic.chat.config.blink = false demonnic.chat.tabsToBlink = {} demonnic:echo("Blinking temporarily turned <red>off<grey>. It will reset if you edit your tabbed chat configuration, or close and reopen mudlet. To make it permanent, change demonnic.chat.config.blink to false in \"Demonnic->Tabbed Chat->Configuration options\" under scripts\n") else demonnic.chat.config.blink = true demonnic.chat:blink() demonnic:echo("Blinking temporarily turned <red>on<grey>. It will reset if you edit your tabbed chat configuration, or close and reopen mudlet. To make it permanent, change demonnic.chat.config.blink to true in \"Demonnic->Tabbed Chat->Configuration options\" under scripts\n") end

Alias.name: fixChat
Alias.script:
local currentsetting = demonnic.chat.config.location local newsetting = "" if currentsetting == "topright" then newsetting = "bottomleft" elseif currentsetting == "topleft" then newsetting = "bottomright" elseif currentsetting == "bottomleft" then newsetting = "topright" elseif currentsetting == "bottomright" then newsetting = "topleft" end
demonnic.chat.config.location = newsetting demonnic.chat:create() demonnic.chat.config.location = currentsetting demonnic.chat:create()

Alias.name: defense toggle
Alias.script: if not string.find(matches[2], "def_") then matches[2] = "def_"..matches[2] end for i in pairs(snd.defenses) do if string.find(i, matches[2]) then if snd.defenses[i].needit then snd.defenses[i].needit = false snd.message("No longer keeping <red>"..i.."<white>.", "echo") send(" ") else snd.defenses[i].needit = true snd.message("Now keeping <green>"..i.."<white>.", "echo") send(" ") end return end end snd.message("No such defense as <red>"..matches[2].."<white>!", "echo") send(" ")

Alias.name: defense options
Alias.script:
local selection = "" if matches[3] then selection = matches[3] else selection = snd.class:lower() end
if snd.class == "Ascendril" then send("simultaneity") end if snd.class == "Archivist" then snd.send("incite lens") end if snd.class == "Sciomancer" then snd.send("channel shadow") end if snd.class == "Teradrim" then snd.send("golem call") end if snd.class == "Tidesage" then snd.send("synth call") end if snd.toggles.active == false then display("Sunder is currently off. Please SNDON to turn it back on! If you wish to remove this behavior, alter it in the 'general deaths' trigger.") else send("def", false) end
snd.load_def(selection)

Alias.name: template
Alias.script:
--[[ This is a blank attack template, just the most basic outline of what an offense alias should look like. ]]-- if snd.class == "MyClass" then -- set this to the class this alias is for snd.starting_attack() -- always run this first, it does some important resets function snd.attack_function() -- defining this function is how we tell Darkside what to do if not snd.waiting.queue then -- don't want to spam, this will prevent that -- declare some important variables, you can add more here if you need local string = "" local call = ""
-- attack logic goes here, you need to set string = whatever you want to send string = "punch "..snd.target call = "wt Afflicting "..snd.target..": DEATH"
-- check if we need to prepend an affliction call if snd.toggles.affcalling and not snd.target_gone then string = call..snd.sep..string end -- we don't want to resend our existing attack, so check against that if string ~= snd.last_attack and not snd.waiting.queue then -- if we've got a new attack now, snd.last_attack = string snd.attack(snd.last_attack) -- manage the anti-spam check below snd.waiting.queue = true tempTimer(snd.delay(), [[snd.waiting.queue = false]]) end end end snd.attack_function() -- make sure to actually send the attack once on use! end

Alias.name: dummy mode
Alias.script: snd.starting_attack() function snd.attack_function() if not snd.waiting.queue then local string = "punch "..snd.target if string ~= snd.last_attack and not snd.waiting.queue then snd.last_attack = string snd.attack(snd.last_attack) snd.waiting.queue = true tempTimer(snd.delay(), [[snd.waiting.queue = false]]) end end end snd.attack_function()
